kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.doc: Executes the ``sql_string`` as a single SQL command.
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
INSERT INTO users(name, email) VALUES ('Janet', 'janet.weaver@reqres.in');

kw.name: Query
kw.arg: SELECT id, name, email FROM users LIMIT 1;
kw.doc: Runs a query with the ``select_statement`` and returns the result as list of rows. The type of row values depends on the database module - usually they are tuples or tuple-like objects.
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
SELECT id, name, email FROM users LIMIT 1;

Query returned 1 rows

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
